== Meeting Details ==

* '''Date:''' Wednesday, February 27, 2008
* '''Location:''' TGI Fridays in Frederick, MD (<nowiki>[[http://frederick.myfridays.com/|Web Site]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&hl=en&geocode=&q=5282+Buckeystown+Pike,+Frederick,+MD&sll=37.0625,-95.677068&sspn=48.688845,82.265625&ie=UTF8&z=16&om=0|Map]]</nowiki>)
* '''Time:''' 7:00pm - 9:00pm

=== Additional Information ===

Join us for a special meeting in Frederick. There will be food, fun, and Ubuntu! New members and anyone interested in Ubuntu, Linux, or FOSS are welcome. Please RSVP by signing the attendees list below so we can get an accurate head count. Also, if you're interested in doing a public key signing, feel free to bring your information. We're looking forward to seeing some new faces!

=== Attendee List ===
Add yourself to the list below if you plan to attend. If you plan on bringing guests, please add the number in the "Guests" column, otherwise leave it blank. Please update the "Total Attending" as well.
